remarks: An alternate formulation of elementhood in a mapping filter that requires ` F ` to be onto.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Oct-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)
statement:
elfm2.l $e |- L = ( Y filGen B ) $.
elfm3 $p |- ( ( B e. ( fBas ` Y ) /\ F : Y -onto-> X ) -> ( A e. ( ( X FilMap F ) ` B ) <-> E. x e. L A = ( F " x ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d F x $.
$d L x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
